verses.verse: And it came to <S%H1961>pass<s%> in the <S%H259>eleventh<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H8141>year,<s%> in the <S%H7992>third<s%> month, in the <S%H259>first<s%> day of the <S%H2320>month,<s%> that the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> me, <S%H559>saying,<s%>

Son <S%H1121><s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H559>speak<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> and <S%H413>to<s%> his <S%H1995>multitude;<s%> <S%H413>Whom<s%> <S%H4310><s%> art thou <S%H1819>like<s%> in thy <S%H1433>greatness?<s%>

Behold, <S%H2009><s%> the <S%H804>Assyrian<s%> was a <S%H730>cedar<s%> in <S%H3844>Lebanon<s%> with <S%H3303>fair<s%> <S%H6057>branches,<s%> and with a <S%H6751>shadowing<s%> <S%H2793>shroud,<s%> and of a <S%H1362>high<s%> <S%H6967>stature;<s%> and his <S%H6788>top<s%> <S%H1961>was<s%> <S%H996>among<s%> the thick <S%H5688>boughs.<s%>

The <S%H4325>waters<s%> made him <S%H1431>great,<s%> the <S%H8415>deep<s%> set him up on <S%H7311>high<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> her <S%H5104>rivers<s%> <S%H1980>running<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%> his <S%H4302>plants,<s%> and sent <S%H7971>out<s%> her little <S%H8585>rivers<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H6086>trees<s%> of the <S%H7704>field.<s%>

Therefore <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3651><s%> his <S%H6967>height<s%> was <S%H1361>exalted<s%> above <S%H4480>all<s%> <S%H3605><s%> the <S%H6086>trees<s%> of the <S%H7704>field,<s%> and his <S%H5634>boughs<s%> were <S%H7235>multiplied,<s%> and his <S%H6288>branches<s%> became <S%H748>long<s%> because of the <S%H7227>multitude<s%> of <S%H4480>waters,<s%> <S%H4325><s%> when he shot <S%H7971>forth.<s%>

All <S%H3605><s%> the <S%H5775>fowls<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven<s%> made their <S%H7077>nests<s%> in his <S%H5589>boughs,<s%> and <S%H8478>under<s%> his <S%H6288>branches<s%> did <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H2416>beasts<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%> bring forth their <S%H3205>young,<s%> and under his <S%H6738>shadow<s%> <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H1471>nations.<s%>

Thus was he <S%H3302>fair<s%> in his <S%H1433>greatness,<s%> in the <S%H753>length<s%> of his <S%H1808>branches:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> his <S%H8328>root<s%> <S%H1961>was<s%> <S%H413>by<s%> <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H4325>waters.<s%>

The <S%H730>cedars<s%> in the <S%H1588>garden<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> could <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H6004>hide<s%> him: the fir <S%H1265>trees<s%> were not <S%H1819>like<s%> <S%H3808><s%> <S%H413><s%> his <S%H5589>boughs,<s%> and the chestnut <S%H6196>trees<s%> <S%H1961>were<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> like his <S%H6288>branches;<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H6086>tree<s%> in the <S%H1588>garden<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> was <S%H1819>like<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> him in his <S%H3308>beauty.<s%>

I have <S%H6213>made<s%> him <S%H3303>fair<s%> by the <S%H7230>multitude<s%> of his <S%H1808>branches:<s%> so that <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H6086>trees<s%> of <S%H5731>Eden,<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> were in the <S%H1588>garden<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H7065>envied<s%> him.

Therefore <S%H3651><s%> <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD;<s%> <S%H3282>Because<s%> <S%H834><s%> thou hast lifted <S%H1361>up<s%> thyself in <S%H6967>height,<s%> and he hath shot <S%H5414>up<s%> his <S%H6788>top<s%> <S%H413>among<s%> <S%H996><s%> the thick <S%H5688>boughs,<s%> and his <S%H3824>heart<s%> is lifted <S%H7311>up<s%> in his <S%H1363>height;<s%>

I have therefore <S%H5414>delivered<s%> him into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the mighty <S%H352>one<s%> of the <S%H1471>heathen;<s%> he shall surely <S%H6213>deal<s%> <S%H6213><s%> with him: I have driven him <S%H1644>out<s%> for his <S%H7562>wickedness.<s%>

And <S%H2114>strangers,<s%> the <S%H6184>terrible<s%> of the <S%H1471>nations,<s%> have cut him <S%H3772>off,<s%> and have <S%H5203>left<s%> him: <S%H413>upon<s%> the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> and in <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1516>valleys<s%> his <S%H1808>branches<s%> are <S%H5307>fallen,<s%> and his <S%H6288>boughs<s%> are <S%H7665>broken<s%> by <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H650>rivers<s%> of the <S%H776>land;<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%> are gone <S%H3381>down<s%> from his <S%H4480>shadow,<s%> <S%H6738><s%> and have <S%H5203>left<s%> him.

Upon <S%H5921><s%> his <S%H4658>ruin<s%> shall <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5775>fowls<s%> of the <S%H8064>heaven<s%> <S%H7931>remain,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H2416>beasts<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H413>upon<s%> his branches: <S%H6288><s%>

To the <S%H4616>end<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> <S%H3808>none<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H6086>trees<s%> by the <S%H4325>waters<s%> exalt <S%H1361>themselves<s%> for their <S%H6967>height,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> shoot <S%H5414>up<s%> <S%H853><s%> their <S%H6788>top<s%> <S%H413>among<s%> <S%H996><s%> the thick <S%H5688>boughs,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> their <S%H352>trees<s%> stand <S%H5975>up<s%> in their <S%H1363>height,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> that <S%H8354>drink<s%> <S%H4325>water:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> they are <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H5414>delivered<s%> unto <S%H4194>death,<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> the nether <S%H8482>parts<s%> of the <S%H776>earth,<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H120>men,<s%> <S%H413>with<s%> them that go <S%H3381>down<s%> to the <S%H953>pit.<s%>

Thus <S%H3541><s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD;<s%> In the <S%H3117>day<s%> when he went <S%H3381>down<s%> to the <S%H7585>grave<s%> I caused a <S%H56>mourning:<s%> I <S%H3680>covered<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H8415>deep<s%> <S%H5921>for<s%> him, and I <S%H4513>restrained<s%> the <S%H5104>floods<s%> thereof, and the <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H4325>waters<s%> were <S%H3607>stayed:<s%> and I caused <S%H3844>Lebanon<s%> to <S%H6937>mourn<s%> <S%H5921>for<s%> him, and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H6086>trees<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%> <S%H5969>fainted<s%> <S%H5921>for<s%> him.

I made the <S%H1471>nations<s%> to <S%H7493>shake<s%> at the <S%H4480>sound<s%> <S%H6963><s%> of his <S%H4658>fall,<s%> when I cast him <S%H3381>down<s%> <S%H853><s%> to <S%H7585>hell<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> them that <S%H3381>descend<s%> into the <S%H953>pit:<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H6086>trees<s%> of <S%H5731>Eden,<s%> the <S%H4005>choice<s%> and <S%H2896>best<s%> of <S%H3844>Lebanon,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> that <S%H8354>drink<s%> <S%H4325>water,<s%> shall be <S%H5162>comforted<s%> in the nether <S%H8482>parts<s%> of the <S%H776>earth.<s%>

They <S%H1992><s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> went <S%H3381>down<s%> into <S%H7585>hell<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> him <S%H413>unto<s%> them that be <S%H2491>slain<s%> with the <S%H2719>sword;<s%> and they that were his <S%H2220>arm,<s%> that <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> under his <S%H6738>shadow<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H1471>heathen.<s%>

To <S%H413><s%> <S%H4310>whom<s%> art thou thus <S%H1819>like<s%> <S%H3602><s%> in <S%H3519>glory<s%> and in <S%H1433>greatness<s%> among the <S%H6086>trees<s%> of <S%H5731>Eden?<s%> yet shalt thou be brought <S%H3381>down<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> the <S%H6086>trees<s%> of <S%H5731>Eden<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the nether <S%H8482>parts<s%> of the <S%H776>earth:<s%> thou shalt <S%H7901>lie<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H6189>uncircumcised<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> them that be <S%H2491>slain<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword.<s%> <S%H1931>This<s%> is <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H1995>multitude,<s%> <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD.<s%>
